attacks.name: Kick Away
attacks.effect: Your opponent switches their Active Pokémon with 1 of their Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Vigorous Dash
attacks.effect: This Pokémon does 30 damage to itself. This attack does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
